category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_DEFERRED_TIMEOUT
preference.preference_description: Specifies the time-out in minutes before the deferred session expires. After you change this preference's value, you must log off and then log on for it to take effect. Valid Values: Any numerical value indicating the time-out in minutes until deferred session expires.0 turns off the time-out.
